name: fitness-duel-monorepo
description: 1v1 Live Fitness Duel Platform - Web & Mobile

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@fitness-duel/shared && npm run build --workspace=@fitness-duel/backend && npm run build --workspace=@fitness-duel/web
scripts.build:backend: npm run build --workspace=@fitness-duel/shared && npm run build --workspace=@fitness-duel/backend
scripts.build:web: npm run build --workspace=@fitness-duel/shared && npm run build --workspace=@fitness-duel/web
